name: Door Key
description: Small yellow key. You found it hidden beneath a doorstep.

name: Fireplace
description: Old brick-layered fireplace. It's cold now as it was long time ago since someone made a fire in it.

name: Door
description: Main entrance door to your house.

states.description: Main entrance door to your house. It is locked.
Main entrance door to your house. It is wide open now.
